Posts.EditableText: There are many libraries available that have been made by people. What do you need the library for?

Whatever

Posts.EditableText:
I started an open-sauce (yum) lib which basically made a standard-looking, nice, basic-featured classic IF stuff.

.. Like it had basic commands "kick #object#" etc, and silly replies.
It made things look nice when you typed "look"... Like:
"looks like you can go north, east, south and west." and
"You can see a bush, a tree, and a broom here"

.. No-one wanted to help and so I gave up after running into some verb issues, and having to totally configure my own "use #object# on #another#" bit.
